yamekuta uthumeku lesa wajambaimatanam thama gathigunada uthum wiya yuthuya.ek madhyawedi uthumek liyannema ohu arakku bipu hati gana kathaya.ohu rakiyawata aawe ohuge piya ohuge athin alla madhya wediyekta bhara di mu umbaata barayi wada purudu karapan yayi kiya atha.monama bandawa ganime patipati winiwidabhawayan natha.namuth mohu puhunu kala madhyawediya widagdhayeki.eya wenama kathawaki.monawa holiyanna puluwan nam echcharaya.uu eda sita dewiyeki.
